description: A survey reveals two thirds of Manx people will not take up the government's advice to holiday at home.
title: Isle of Man survey reveals two thirds of people 'snub staycation plea'
title_page: Isle of Man survey reveals two thirds of people 'snub staycation plea' - BBC News
maintext: Meanwhile, about 23% of respondents said they felt they were worse off financially since restrictions had been lifted, while 59% remained the same and 10% said their situation had improved.
